p: We classified each area with microendemics in phytogeographic domains (hereafter domains) by using Brazilâ€™s domain (= biomes) map produced by the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE) at a 1:1,000,000 scale ( IBGE, 2004) as a background, with a few changes in the boundaries of the Caatinga domain ( Silva, Leal & Tabarelli, 2017) ( Fig. S1). We used the centroid of each area with microendemics to classify it in one of the six Brazilian major domains: Amazon, Caatinga, Cerrado, Pantanal, Atlantic Forest, and Pampa.
